GE07mbh_02_u:2451: 02,022.004d*0254_01 bale tubhyaṃ mahābāho tam imaṃ jahi māgadham

GE07mbh_02_u:2463: 02,022.006c babhañja pṛṣṭhe saṃkṣipya niṣpiṣya vinanāda ca

GE07mbh_02_u:2469: 02,022.008a vitresur māgadhāḥ sarve strīṇāṃ garbhāś ca susruvuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2471: 02,022.009a kiṃ nu svid dhimavān bhinnaḥ kiṃ nu svid dīryate mahī

GE07mbh_02_u:2474: 02,022.009d*0258_02 ekaṃ pādaṃ padākramya dorbhyām anyaṃ pragṛhya ca
GE07mbh_02_u:2475: 02,022.009d*0258_03 gudataḥ pāṭayām āsa śākhām iva mahāgajaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2478: 02,022.009d@008_0001 vīkṣya bhīmaṃ tataḥ kṛṣṇo naḷaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā
GE07mbh_02_u:2479: 02,022.009d@008_0002 dvidhā vyatilikhat taṃ tu jarāsaṃdhavadhaṃ prati
GE07mbh_02_u:2482: 02,022.009d@008_0005 punaḥ saṃdhāya tu tadā jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_02_u:2483: 02,022.009d@008_0006 bhīmena saha saṃgamya bāhuyuddhaṃ cakāra ha
GE07mbh_02_u:2489: 02,022.009d@008_0012 dvidhā vyatyasya pādena prākṣipac ca nanāda ha
GE07mbh_02_u:2492: 02,022.010a tato rājakuladvāri prasuptam iva taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_02_u:2495: 02,022.011c āropya bhrātarau caiva mokṣayām āsa bāndhavān
GE07mbh_02_u:2496: 02,022.012a te vai ratnabhujaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ratnārhaṃ pṛthivīśvarāḥ

GE07mbh_02_u:2499: 02,022.013c ratham āsthāya taṃ divyaṃ nirjagāma girivrajāt
GE07mbh_02_u:2501: 02,022.013d*0259_02 mahārhāṇi ca ratnāni rajataṃ kāñcanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_02_u:2504: 02,022.014a yaḥ sa sodaryavān nāma dviyodhaḥ kṛṣṇasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2509: 02,022.016c rathena tena taṃ kṛṣṇa upāruhya yayau tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:2511: 02,022.016d*0260_02 kṛṣṇapraṇītau loke 'smin rathe ko draṣṭum arhati
GE07mbh_02_u:2516: 02,022.018a yena śakro dānavānāṃ jaghāna navatīr nava
GE07mbh_02_u:2517: 02,022.018c taṃ prāpya samahṛṣyanta rathaṃ te puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2518: 02,022.019a tataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ mahābāhuṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ sahitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:2520: 02,022.020a hayair divyaiḥ samāyukto ratho vāyusamo jave
GE07mbh_02_u:2524: 02,022.022a cintayām āsa kṛṣṇo 'tha garutmantaṃ sa cābhyayāt
GE07mbh_02_u:2525: 02,022.022c kṣaṇe tasmin sa tenāsīc caityayūpa ivocchritaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2530: 02,022.025a na sa sajjati vṛkṣeṣu śastraiś cāpi na riṣyate
GE07mbh_02_u:2534: 02,022.027a yaṃ lebhe vāsavād rājā vasus tasmād bṛhadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2537: 02,022.028c girivrajād bahis tasthau same deśe mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2541: 02,022.030c pūjayām āsur ūcuś ca sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2545: 02,022.032c rājñāṃ samabhyuddharaṇaṃ yad idaṃ kṛtam adya te
GE07mbh_02_u:2547: 02,022.033c diṣṭyā mokṣād yaśo dīptam āptaṃ te puruṣottama
GE07mbh_02_u:2549: 02,022.034c kṛtam ity eva taj jñeyaṃ nṛpair yady api duṣkaram
GE07mbh_02_u:2553: 02,022.036c sarvair bhavadbhir yajñārthe sāhāyyaṃ dīyatām iti
GE07mbh_02_u:2555: 02,022.037c tathety evābruvan sarve pratijajñuś ca tāṃ giram
GE07mbh_02_u:2556: 02,022.038a ratnabhājaṃ ca dāśārhaṃ cakrus te pṛthivīśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2563: 02,022.040d@009_0001 yat kṛtaṃ puruṣavyāghra mama pitrā janārdana
GE07mbh_02_u:2564: 02,022.040d@009_0002 tat te hṛdi mahābāho na kāryaṃ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_02_u:2565: 02,022.040d@009_0003 tvāṃ prapanno 'smi govinda prasādaṃ kuru me prabho
GE07mbh_02_u:2572: 02,022.040d@009_0009 kriyatāṃ saṃskriyā rājan pitus ta iti cābruvan
GE07mbh_02_u:2573: 02,022.040d@009_0010 tac chrutvā vāsudevasya pārthayoś ca māgadhaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2574: 02,022.040d@009_0011 praviśya nagaraṃ tūrṇaṃ saha mantribhir apy uta
GE07mbh_02_u:2576: 02,022.040d@009_0013 kālāgurusugandhaiś ca tailaiś ca vividhair api
GE07mbh_02_u:2580: 02,022.040d@009_0017 kṛtvā pituḥ svargagatiṃ niryayau yatra keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2582: 02,022.040d@009_0019 sa prahvaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vijñāpayata mādhavam
GE07mbh_02_u:2584: 02,022.040d@009_0021 hastino 'śvāś ca govinda vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_02_u:2585: 02,022.040d@009_0022 dīyatāṃ dharmarājāya yathā vā manyate bhavān
GE07mbh_02_u:2586: 02,022.041a bhayārtāya tatas tasmai kṛṣṇo dattvābhayaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:2591: 02,022.042a gatvaikatvaṃ ca kṛṣṇena pārthābhyāṃ caiva satkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2592: 02,022.042c viveśa rājā matimān punar bārhadrathaṃ puram
GE07mbh_02_u:2594: 02,022.042d*0264_01 pārthābhyāṃ sahitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sarvaiś ca vasudhādhipaiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2598: 02,022.042d*0264_05 evam uktvā mādhavena sarve te vasudhādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2599: 02,022.042d*0264_06 evam astv iti cāpy uktvā sametāḥ parayā mudā
GE07mbh_02_u:2602: 02,022.043a kṛṣṇas tu saha pārthābhyāṃ śriyā paramayā jvalan
GE07mbh_02_u:2609: 02,022.046c punaḥ svanagaraṃ prāptāv akṣatāv iti bhārata
GE07mbh_02_u:2612: 02,022.048a tataḥ kṣīṇe jarāsaṃdhe bhrātṛbhyāṃ vihitaṃ jayam
GE07mbh_02_u:2614: 02,022.048d@010_0001 hṛṣṭaś ca dharmarāḍ vākyaṃ janārdanam abhāṣata
GE07mbh_02_u:2619: 02,022.048d@010_0006 pītaṃ pṛthivyāṃ kruddhena yaśas te puruṣottama
GE07mbh_02_u:2621: 02,022.048d@010_0008 evaṃ saṃbhāṣya kaunteyaḥ prādād rathavaraṃ prabho
GE07mbh_02_u:2622: 02,022.048d@010_0009 pratigṛhya tu govindo jarāsaṃdhasya taṃ ratham
GE07mbh_02_u:2625: 02,022.049a yathāvayaḥ samāgamya rājabhis taiś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2628: 02,022.050c jagmuḥ svadeśāṃs tvaritā yānair uccāvacais tataḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2630: 02,022.051c pāṇḍavair ghātayām āsa jarāsaṃdham ariṃ tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:2632: 02,022.052c dharmarājam anujñāpya pṛthāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_02_u:2633: 02,022.053a subhadrāṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca phalgunaṃ yamajau tathā
GE07mbh_02_u:2634: 02,022.053c dhaumyam āmantrayitvā ca prayayau svāṃ purīṃ prati
GE07mbh_02_u:2636: 02,022.053d*0265_02 harṣeṇa mahatā yuktaḥ prāpya cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2637: 02,022.053d*0265_03 jagāma hṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇas tu punar dvāravatīṃ purīm
GE07mbh_02_u:2643: 02,022.056c jayaṃ labdhvā suvipulaṃ rājñām abhayadās tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:2645: 02,022.057c draupadyāḥ pāṇḍavā rājan parāṃ prītim avardhayan
GE07mbh_02_u:2646: 02,022.058a tasmin kāle tu yad yuktaṃ dharmakāmārthasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_02_u:2649: 02,023.001a pārthaḥ prāpya dhanuḥśreṣṭham akṣayyau ca maheṣudhī
GE07mbh_02_u:2650: 02,023.001c rathaṃ dhvajaṃ sabhāṃ caiva yudhiṣṭhiram abhāṣata
GE07mbh_02_u:2651: 02,023.001d*0266_01 ṛṣes tad vacanaṃ cintya niśaśvāsa yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2652: 02,023.001d*0266_02 dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kartum icchan paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2655: 02,023.002a dhanur astraṃ śarā vīryaṃ pakṣo bhūmir yaśo balam
GE07mbh_02_u:2656: 02,023.002c prāptam etan mayā rājan duṣprāpaṃ yad abhīpsitam
GE07mbh_02_u:2660: 02,023.002d@011_0004 sādhu sādhv iti kaunteya diṣṭyā te buddhir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_02_u:2661: 02,023.002d@011_0005 pṛthivīm akhilāṃ jetum eko vyavasito bhavān
GE07mbh_02_u:2662: 02,023.002d@011_0006 dhanyaḥ pāṇḍur mahīpālo yasya putras tvam īdṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2667: 02,023.002d@011_0011 yamayoś caiva vīryeṇa sarvaṃ prāpsyati dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_02_u:2668: 02,023.002d@011_0012 tasmād diśaṃ devaguptām udīcīṃ gaccha phalguna
GE07mbh_02_u:2669: 02,023.002d@011_0013 śakto bhavān surāñ jitvā ratnāny āhartum ojasā
GE07mbh_02_u:2671: 02,023.002d@011_0015 yāmyāṃ tatra diśaṃ yātu sahadevo mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2673: 02,023.002d@011_0017 eṣā me naiṣṭhikī buddhiḥ kriyatāṃ bharatarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2674: 02,023.002d@011_0018 śrutvā vyāsavaco hṛṣṭās tam ūcuḥ pāṇḍunandanāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2676: 02,023.002d@011_0020 te 'py anujñāpya rājānaṃ sainyena mahatā vṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2677: 02,023.003a tatra kṛtyam ahaṃ manye kośasyāsya vivardhanam
GE07mbh_02_u:2681: 02,023.004c tithāv atha muhūrte ca nakṣatre ca tathā śive
GE07mbh_02_u:2686: 02,023.006e vijayas te dhruvaṃ pārtha priyaṃ kāmam avāpnuhi
GE07mbh_02_u:2687: 02,023.007a ity uktaḥ prayayau pārthaḥ sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2692: 02,023.009c bhīmasenas tathā prācīṃ sahadevas tu dakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_02_u:2693: 02,023.010a pratīcīṃ nakulo rājan diśaṃ vyajayad astravit
GE07mbh_02_u:2698: 02,023.011c na hi tṛpyāmi pūrveṣāṃ śṛṇvānaś caritaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_02_u:2700: 02,023.012a dhanaṃjayasya vakṣyāmi vijayaṃ pūrvam eva te
GE07mbh_02_u:2705: 02,023.012d*0269_04 amarṣāt pārthivendrās te taṃ sameyur yuyutsavaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2708: 02,023.012d*0269_07 tat pārthaḥ pārthivaṃ kṣatraṃ yuyutsuḥ paramāhave
GE07mbh_02_u:2712: 02,023.012d*0269_11 taj jitvā pārthivaṃ kṣatraṃ samare paravīrahā
GE07mbh_02_u:2713: 02,023.012d*0269_12 yayau tadā vaśe kartum udīcīṃ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2716: 02,023.013d*0270_01 tenaiva sahitaḥ prāyāj jiṣṇuḥ sālvapuraṃ prati
GE07mbh_02_u:2719: 02,023.013d*0270_04 taṃ pārthaḥ sahasā jitvā dyumatsenaṃ dhaneśvaram
GE07mbh_02_u:2723: 02,023.014a ānartān kālakūṭāṃś ca kuṇindāṃś ca vijitya saḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2725: 02,023.015a sa tena sahito rājan savyasācī paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2726: 02,023.015c vijigye sakalaṃ dvīpaṃ prativindhyaṃ ca pārthivam
GE07mbh_02_u:2727: 02,023.016a sakaladvīpavāsāṃś ca saptadvīpe ca ye nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2730: 02,023.017a sa tān api maheṣvāso vijitya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_02_u:2731: 02,023.017c tair eva sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ prāgjyotiṣam upādravat
GE07mbh_02_u:2732: 02,023.018a tatra rājā mahān āsīd bhagadatto viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_02_u:2734: 02,023.019a sa kirātaiś ca cīnaiś ca vṛtaḥ prāgjyotiṣo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_02_u:2736: 02,023.020a tataḥ sa divasān aṣṭau yodhayitvā dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_02_u:2742: 02,023.022a ahaṃ sakhā surendrasya śakrād anavamo raṇe
GE07mbh_02_u:2743: 02,023.022c na ca śaknomi te tāta sthātuṃ pramukhato yudhi
GE07mbh_02_u:2744: 02,023.023a kim īpsitaṃ pāṇḍaveya brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_02_u:2745: 02,023.023c yad vakṣyasi mahābāho tat kariṣyāmi putraka
GE07mbh_02_u:2749: 02,023.024c tasya pārthivatām īpse karas tasmai pradīyatām
GE07mbh_02_u:2750: 02,023.025a bhavān pitṛsakhā caiva prīyamāṇo mayāpi ca
GE07mbh_02_u:2753: 02,023.026a kuntīmātar yathā me tvaṃ tathā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2754: 02,023.026b*0274_01 sa tatra satkṛtas tena māsam uṣya dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2757: 02,023.026b*0274_04 anyān api vaśe cakre tarasā pākaśāsaniḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2758: 02,023.026c sarvam etat kariṣyāmi kiṃ cānyat karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_02_u:2764: 02,024.002a antargiriṃ ca kaunteyas tathaiva ca bahirgirim
GE07mbh_02_u:2766: 02,024.003a vijitya parvatān sarvān ye ca tatra narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2767: 02,024.003c tān vaśe sthāpayitvā sa ratnāny ādāya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2768: 02,024.004a tair eva sahitaḥ sarvair anurajya ca tān nṛpān
GE07mbh_02_u:2771: 02,024.005c hastināṃ ca ninādena kampayan vasudhām imām
GE07mbh_02_u:2773: 02,024.006c niṣkramya nagarāt tasmād yodhayām āsa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_02_u:2775: 02,024.007c na śaśāka bṛhantas tu soḍhuṃ pāṇḍavavikramam
GE07mbh_02_u:2779: 02,024.008d*0276_02 arbudaṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca nyarbudaṃ vājināṃ tathā
GE07mbh_02_u:2781: 02,024.009a sa tad rājyam avasthāpya kulūtasahito yayau
GE07mbh_02_u:2782: 02,024.009c senābindum atho rājan rājyād āśu samākṣipat
GE07mbh_02_u:2784: 02,024.010c kulūtān uttarāṃś caiva tāṃś ca rājñaḥ samānayat
GE07mbh_02_u:2786: 02,024.011c vyajayad dhanaṃjayo rājan deśān pañca pramāṇataḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:2787: 02,024.012a sa divaḥprastham āsādya senābindoḥ puraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_02_u:2789: 02,024.013a sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvair viṣvagaśvaṃ narādhipam
GE07mbh_02_u:2800: 02,024.016c vyajayal lohitaṃ caiva maṇḍalair daśabhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_02_u:2801: 02,024.017a tatas trigartān kaunteyo dārvān kokanadāś ca ye

GE07mbh_02_u:4211: 02,035.008a asyāṃ ca samitau rājñām ekam apy ajitaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_02_u:4213: 02,035.009a na hi kevalam asmākam ayam arcyatamo 'cyutaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4215: 02,035.010a kṛṣṇena hi jitā yuddhe bahavaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4216: 02,035.010c jagat sarvaṃ ca vārṣṇeye nikhilena pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_02_u:4217: 02,035.011a tasmāt satsv api vṛddheṣu kṛṣṇam arcāma netarān
GE07mbh_02_u:4218: 02,035.011c evaṃ vaktuṃ na cārhas tvaṃ mā bhūt te buddhir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_02_u:4220: 02,035.012b*0356_01 yasya rājan prabhāvajñāḥ purā sarve ca rakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4221: 02,035.012c teṣāṃ kathayatāṃ śaurer ahaṃ guṇavato guṇān
GE07mbh_02_u:4223: 02,035.013a karmāṇy api ca yāny asya janmaprabhṛti dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4224: 02,035.013c bahuśaḥ kathyamānāni narair bhūyaḥ śrutāni me
GE07mbh_02_u:4225: 02,035.014a na kevalaṃ vayaṃ kāmāc cedirāja janārdanam
GE07mbh_02_u:4226: 02,035.014c na saṃbandhaṃ puraskṛtya kṛtārthaṃ vā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_02_u:4228: 02,035.015c yaśaḥ śauryaṃ jayaṃ cāsya vijñāyārcāṃ prayujmahe
GE07mbh_02_u:4229: 02,035.016a na hi kaś cid ihāsmābhiḥ subālo 'py aparīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4230: 02,035.016c guṇair vṛddhān atikramya harir arcyatamo mataḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4233: 02,035.017c pūjye tāv iha govinde hetū dvāv api saṃsthitau
GE07mbh_02_u:4235: 02,035.018c nṛṇāṃ hi loke kasyāsti viśiṣṭaṃ keśavād ṛte
GE07mbh_02_u:4236: 02,035.019a dānaṃ dākṣyaṃ śrutaṃ śauryaṃ hrīḥ kīrtir buddhir uttamā
GE07mbh_02_u:4237: 02,035.019c saṃnatiḥ śrīr dhṛtis tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiś ca niyatācyute
GE07mbh_02_u:4238: 02,035.020a tam imaṃ sarvasaṃpannam ācāryaṃ pitaraṃ gurum
GE07mbh_02_u:4239: 02,035.020c arcyam arcitam arcārhaṃ sarve saṃmantum arhatha
GE07mbh_02_u:4240: 02,035.021a ṛtvig gurur vivāhyaś ca snātako nṛpatiḥ priyaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4242: 02,035.022a kṛṣṇa eva hi lokānām utpattir api cāpyayaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4243: 02,035.022c kṛṣṇasya hi kṛte bhūtam idaṃ viśvaṃ samarpitam
GE07mbh_02_u:4244: 02,035.023a eṣa prakṛtir avyaktā kartā caiva sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4246: 02,035.024a buddhir mano mahān vāyus tejo 'mbhaḥ khaṃ mahī ca yā
GE07mbh_02_u:4247: 02,035.024c caturvidhaṃ ca yad bhūtaṃ sarvaṃ kṛṣṇe pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_02_u:4248: 02,035.025a ādityaś candramāś caiva nakṣatrāṇi grahāś ca ye
GE07mbh_02_u:4249: 02,035.025c diśaś copadiśaś caiva sarvaṃ kṛṣṇe pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_02_u:4251: 02,035.025d*0358_02 rājā mukhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ sāgaro mukham
GE07mbh_02_u:4252: 02,035.025d*0358_03 nakṣatrāṇāṃ mukhaṃ candra ādityas tejasāṃ mukham
GE07mbh_02_u:4253: 02,035.025d*0358_04 parvatānāṃ mukhaṃ merur garuḍaḥ patatāṃ mukham
GE07mbh_02_u:4254: 02,035.025d*0358_05 ūrdhvaṃ tiryag adhaś caiva yāvatī jagato gatiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4256: 02,035.025d*0359_01 eṣa rudraś ca sarvātmā brahmā caiṣa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4258: 02,035.026a ayaṃ tu puruṣo bālaḥ śiśupālo na budhyate
GE07mbh_02_u:4259: 02,035.026c sarvatra sarvadā kṛṣṇaṃ tasmād evaṃ prabhāṣate
GE07mbh_02_u:4260: 02,035.027a yo hi dharmaṃ vicinuyād utkṛṣṭaṃ matimān naraḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4261: 02,035.027c sa vai paśyed yathādharmaṃ na tathā cedirāḍ ayam
GE07mbh_02_u:4263: 02,035.028c ko nārhaṃ manyate kṛṣṇaṃ ko vāpy enaṃ na pūjayet
GE07mbh_02_u:4267: 02,035.029d@021_0001 evam ukte tu gāṅgeye śiśupālaś cukopa ha
GE07mbh_02_u:4270: 02,035.029d@021_0003 nītipūrvam idaṃ sarvaṃ cedirāja mayā kṛtam
GE07mbh_02_u:4271: 02,035.029d@021_0004 na me vimatir astīha kāraṇaṃ cātra me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_02_u:4272: 02,035.029d@021_0005 sa pārthivānāṃ sarveṣāṃ guruḥ kṛṣṇo balena vai
GE07mbh_02_u:4274: 02,035.029d@021_0007 yo vā na sahate rājñāṃ kaś cit sabalavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4275: 02,035.029d@021_0008 kṣipraṃ yuddhāya niryātu śaktaś ced atra me yudhi
GE07mbh_02_u:4276: 02,035.029d@021_0009 tasya mūrdhni susaṃnyastaṃ rājñaḥ savyaṃ padaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_02_u:4277: 02,035.029d@021_0010 evam ukto mayā hetur uttaraṃ prabravītu me
GE07mbh_02_u:4279: 02,035.029d@021_0011 tato na vyājahāraiṣāṃ kaś cid buddhimatāṃ satām
GE07mbh_02_u:4280: 02,035.029d@021_0012 mānināṃ balināṃ rājñāṃ madhye saṃdarśite pade
GE07mbh_02_u:4284: 02,035.029d@021_0016 tasya kopaṃ samudbhūtaṃ jñātvā bhīṣmaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_02_u:4286: 02,035.029d@021_0018 sa sunīthaṃ samāmantrya tāṃś ca sarvān mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4287: 02,035.029d@021_0019 uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭha idaṃ matimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4288: 02,035.029d@021_0020 sahadevena rājāno yad uktaṃ keśavaṃ prati
GE07mbh_02_u:4290: 02,035.029d@021_0021 tat tatheti vijānīdhvaṃ bhūyaś cātra nibodhata
GE07mbh_02_u:4291: 02,035.029d@021_0022 tato bhīṣmasya tac chrutvā vacaḥ kāle yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4295: 02,035.029d@021_0026 karmaṇām ānupūrvyaṃ ca prādurbhāvāṃś ca me vibhoḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4297: 02,035.029d@021_0027 yathā ca prakṛtiḥ kṛṣṇe tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_02_u:4298: 02,035.029d@021_0028 evam uktas tadā bhīṣmaḥ provāca puruṣarṣabham
GE07mbh_02_u:4303: 02,035.029d@021_0033 idaṃ matimatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ prati viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_02_u:4305: 02,035.029d@021_0035 bhīmakarmā tato bhīṣmo bhūyaḥ sa idam abravīt
GE07mbh_02_u:4307: 02,035.029d@021_0036 kurūṇāṃ cāpi rājānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram uvāca ha
GE07mbh_02_u:4308: 02,035.029d@021_0037 vartamānām atītāṃ ca śṛṇu rājan yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_02_u:4310: 02,035.029d@021_0039 avyakto vyaktaliṅgastho ya eṣa bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4316: 02,035.029d@021_0045 anekavarṇo devādir avyaktād vai pare sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4317: 02,035.029d@021_0046 asṛjat salilaṃ pūrvaṃ sa ca nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4318: 02,035.029d@021_0047 tatas tu bhagavāṃs toye brahmāṇam asṛjat svayam
GE07mbh_02_u:4319: 02,035.029d@021_0048 brahmā caturmukho lokān sarvāṃs tān asṛjat svayam
GE07mbh_02_u:4320: 02,035.029d@021_0049 ādikāle purā hy evaṃ sarvalokasya codbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4324: 02,035.029d@021_0053 ekas tiṣṭhati sarvātmā sa tu nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4326: 02,035.029d@021_0055 śiras tasya divaṃ rājan nābhiḥ khaṃ caraṇau mahī
GE07mbh_02_u:4330: 02,035.029d@021_0059 sarvaṃ vyāpya haris tasthau sūtraṃ maṇigaṇān iva
GE07mbh_02_u:4335: 02,035.029d@021_0064 sanatkumāraṃ rudraṃ ca manuṃ caiva tapodhanān
GE07mbh_02_u:4336: 02,035.029d@021_0065 sarvam evāsṛjad brahmā tato lokān prajās tathā
GE07mbh_02_u:4337: 02,035.029d@021_0066 tena tad vyasṛjat tatra prāpte kāle yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_02_u:4339: 02,035.029d@021_0068 kalpānāṃ bahukoṭyaś ca samatītā hi bhārata
GE07mbh_02_u:4343: 02,035.029d@021_0072 sṛṣṭvā caturmukhaṃ devaṃ devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4344: 02,035.029d@021_0073 sa lokānāṃ hitārthāya kṣīrode vasati prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4345: 02,035.029d@021_0074 brahmā tu sarvabhūtānāṃ lokasya ca pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4348: 02,035.029d@021_0076 avyakto vyaktaliṅgastho ya eṣa bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4350: 02,035.029d@021_0078 eṣa nārāyaṇo bhūtvā harir āsīd yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_02_u:4351: 02,035.029d@021_0079 brahmāṇaṃ śaśisūryau ca dharmaṃ caivāsṛjat svayam
GE07mbh_02_u:4353: 02,035.029d@021_0081 prādurbhāvāṃs tu vakṣyāmi divyān devagaṇair yutān
GE07mbh_02_u:4356: 02,035.029d@021_0084 brahmāṇaṃ kapilaṃ caiva parameṣṭhiṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_02_u:4357: 02,035.029d@021_0085 devān saptaṛṣīṃś caiva śaṃkaraṃ ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4363: 02,035.029d@021_0091 hatau prabhavatā tena tayor dattvā vṛtaṃ varam
GE07mbh_02_u:4364: 02,035.029d@021_0092 bhūmiṃ baddhvā kṛtau pūrvaṃ mṛnmayau dvau mahāsurau
GE07mbh_02_u:4365: 02,035.029d@021_0093 karṇasrotodbhavau tau tu viṣṇos tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4367: 02,035.029d@021_0095 tau viveśa svayaṃ vāyur brahmaṇā sādhu coditaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4368: 02,035.029d@021_0096 tau divaṃ chādayitvā tu vavṛdhāte mahāsurau
GE07mbh_02_u:4369: 02,035.029d@021_0097 vāyuprāṇau tu tau dṛṣṭvā brahmā paryāmṛśac chanaiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4370: 02,035.029d@021_0098 ekaṃ mṛdutaraṃ viddhi kaṭhinaṃ viddhi cāparam
GE07mbh_02_u:4371: 02,035.029d@021_0099 nāmanī tu tayoś cakre sa vibhuḥ salilodbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4372: 02,035.029d@021_0100 mṛdus tv ayaṃ madhur nāma kaṭhinaḥ kaiṭabhaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_02_u:4374: 02,035.029d@021_0102 tau purātha divaṃ sarvāṃ prāptau rājan mahāsurau
GE07mbh_02_u:4377: 02,035.029d@021_0105 tau gatāv asurau dṛṣṭvā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4380: 02,035.029d@021_0108 āsīd ādau svayaṃ janma tat paṅkajam apaṅkajam
GE07mbh_02_u:4383: 02,035.029d@021_0111 bahūn varṣāyutān apsu śayānau na cakampatuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4384: 02,035.029d@021_0112 atha dīrghasya kālasya tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau
GE07mbh_02_u:4385: 02,035.029d@021_0113 ājagmatus tam uddeśaṃ yatra brahmā vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4386: 02,035.029d@021_0114 tau dṛṣṭvā lokanāthas tu kopāt saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4388: 02,035.029d@021_0116 tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ tayos tasya ca vai tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:4389: 02,035.029d@021_0117 ekārṇave tadā ghore trailokye jalatāṃ gate
GE07mbh_02_u:4390: 02,035.029d@021_0118 tad abhūt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ varṣasaṃghān sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4391: 02,035.029d@021_0119 na ca tāv asurau yuddhe tadā śramam avāpatuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4392: 02,035.029d@021_0120 atha dīrghasya kālasya tau daityau yuddhadurmadau
GE07mbh_02_u:4394: 02,035.029d@021_0122 prītau svas tava yuddhena ślāghyas tvaṃ mṛtyur āvayoḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4395: 02,035.029d@021_0123 āvāṃ jahi na yatrorvī salilena pariplutā
GE07mbh_02_u:4396: 02,035.029d@021_0124 hatau ca tava putratvaṃ prāpnuyāva surottama
GE07mbh_02_u:4397: 02,035.029d@021_0125 yo hy āvāṃ yudhi nirjetā tasyāvāṃ vihitau sutau
GE07mbh_02_u:4398: 02,035.029d@021_0126 tayoḥ sa vacanaṃ śrutvā tadā nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4399: 02,035.029d@021_0127 tau pragṛhya mṛdhe daityau dorbhyāṃ tau samapīḍayat
GE07mbh_02_u:4400: 02,035.029d@021_0128 ūrubhyāṃ nidhanaṃ cakre tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau
GE07mbh_02_u:4401: 02,035.029d@021_0129 tau hatau cāplutau toye vapurbhyām ekatāṃ gatau
GE07mbh_02_u:4403: 02,035.029d@021_0131 medasā taj jalaṃ vyāptaṃ tābhyām antardadhe tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:4404: 02,035.029d@021_0132 nārāyaṇaś ca bhagavān asṛjad vividhāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4405: 02,035.029d@021_0133 daityayor medasā channā sarvā rājan vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_02_u:4406: 02,035.029d@021_0134 tadā prabhṛti kaunteya medinīti smṛtā mahī
GE07mbh_02_u:4407: 02,035.029d@021_0135 prabhāvāt padmanābhasya śāśvatī ca kṛtā nṛṇām
GE07mbh_02_u:4410: 02,035.029d@021_0137 yathāśakti tu vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tān kurunandana
GE07mbh_02_u:4412: 02,035.029d@021_0139 puṣkare yatra saṃbhūtā devā ṛṣigaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_02_u:4416: 02,035.029d@021_0143 yatra viṣṇuḥ suraśreṣṭho vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4431: 02,035.029d@021_0158 evaṃ yajñavarāho vai bhūtvā viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4434: 02,035.029d@021_0161 majjitāṃ salile tasmin svadevīṃ pṛthivīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:4441: 02,035.029d@021_0168 vārāhaḥ kathito hy eṣa nārasiṃham atho śṛṇu
GE07mbh_02_u:4447: 02,035.029d@021_0173 sa praviśya vanaṃ rājaṃś cakāra tapa uttamam
GE07mbh_02_u:4448: 02,035.029d@021_0174 daśa varṣasahasrāṇi śatāni daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_02_u:4451: 02,035.029d@021_0177 brahmā prītamanās tasya tapasā niyamena ca
GE07mbh_02_u:4452: 02,035.029d@021_0178 tataḥ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān svayam āgamya bhūpate
GE07mbh_02_u:4454: 02,035.029d@021_0180 ādityair vasubhiḥ sādhyair marudbhir daivataiḥ saha
GE07mbh_02_u:4456: 02,035.029d@021_0182 diśābhir vidiśābhiś ca nadībhiḥ sāgarais tathā
GE07mbh_02_u:4457: 02,035.029d@021_0183 nakṣatraiś ca muhūrtaiś ca khecaraiś cāparair grahaiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4462: 02,035.029d@021_0187 brahmā brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭho daityam āgamya cābravīt
GE07mbh_02_u:4464: 02,035.029d@021_0189 varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi
GE07mbh_02_u:4467: 02,035.029d@021_0191 na mānuṣāḥ piśācāś ca hanyur māṃ devasattama
GE07mbh_02_u:4468: 02,035.029d@021_0192 ṛṣayo vā na māṃ śāpaiḥ kruddhā lokapitāmaha
GE07mbh_02_u:4469: 02,035.029d@021_0193 śapeyus tapasā yuktā vara eṣa vṛto mayā
GE07mbh_02_u:4470: 02,035.029d@021_0194 na śastreṇa na cāstreṇa giriṇā pādapena ca
GE07mbh_02_u:4471: 02,035.029d@021_0195 na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa syān na cānyena me vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4472: 02,035.029d@021_0196 nākāśe vā na bhūmau vā rātrau vā divase 'pi vā
GE07mbh_02_u:4473: 02,035.029d@021_0197 nāntar vā na bahir vāpi syād vadho me pitāmaha
GE07mbh_02_u:4474: 02,035.029d@021_0198 paśubhir vā mṛgair na syāt pakṣibhir vā sarīsṛpaiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4476: 02,035.029d@021_0199 dadāsi ced varān etān devadeva vṛṇomy aham
GE07mbh_02_u:4477: 02,035.029d@021_0200 ete divyā varās tāta mayā dattās tavādbhutāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4478: 02,035.029d@021_0201 sarvakāmān varāṃs tāta prāpsyase tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4479: 02,035.029d@021_0202 evam uktvā sa bhagavān ākāśena jagāma ha
GE07mbh_02_u:4481: 02,035.029d@021_0204 tato devāś ca nāgāś ca gandharvā munayas tathā
GE07mbh_02_u:4489: 02,035.029d@021_0210 tato lokahitaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4491: 02,035.029d@021_0212 avaśyaṃ tridaśās tena prāptavyaṃ tapasaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_02_u:4493: 02,035.029d@021_0214 etac chrutvā surāḥ sarve brahmaṇā tasya vai vadham
GE07mbh_02_u:4494: 02,035.029d@021_0215 svāni sthānāni divyāni jagmus te vai mudānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4495: 02,035.029d@021_0216 labdhamātre vare cāpi sarvās tā bādhate prajāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4498: 02,035.029d@021_0219 sapta dvīpān vaśe cakre lokālokāntaraṃ balāt
GE07mbh_02_u:4499: 02,035.029d@021_0220 divyalokān samastān vai bhogān divyān avāpa saḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4501: 02,035.029d@021_0222 trailokyaṃ vaśam ānīya svarge vasati dānavaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4503: 02,035.029d@021_0224 atha lokān samastāṃś ca vijitya sa mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:4504: 02,035.029d@021_0225 bhaveyam aham evendraḥ somo 'gnir māruto raviḥ

GE07mbh_02_u:5130: 02,035.029d@021_0829 tataḥ kṛṣṇo mahātejās tadā gatvā tu govrajam
GE07mbh_02_u:5133: 02,035.029d@021_0832 taṃ dṛṣṭvā gopakāḥ sarve kṛṣṇam eva samarcayan
GE07mbh_02_u:5134: 02,035.029d@021_0833 pūjyamānas tato gopair divyaṃ vapur adhārayat
GE07mbh_02_u:5135: 02,035.029d@021_0834 dhṛto govardhano nāma saptāhaṃ parvatas tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:5137: 02,035.029d@021_0836 krīḍamānas tadā kṛṣṇaḥ kṛtavān karma duṣkaram
GE07mbh_02_u:5139: 02,035.029d@021_0838 devadevaḥ kṣitiṃ gatvā kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā mudānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5140: 02,035.029d@021_0839 govinda iti taṃ hy uktvā hy abhyaṣiñcat puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5144: 02,035.029d@021_0843 keśinaṃ nāma daiteyaṃ rājan vai hayavigraham
GE07mbh_02_u:5147: 02,035.029d@021_0846 āndhraṃ mallaṃ ca cāṇūraṃ nijaghāna mahāsuram
GE07mbh_02_u:5151: 02,035.029d@021_0850 trāsitaś ca tadā kaṃsaḥ sa hi kṛṣṇena bhārata
GE07mbh_02_u:5154: 02,035.029d@021_0853 hatvā kaṃsam amitraghnaḥ sarveṣāṃ paśyatāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:5158: 02,035.029d@021_0856 evaṃ bālye 'pi gopālaiḥ krīḍābhis tau vijahratuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5159: 02,035.029d@021_0857 tatas tau jagmatus tāta guruṃ sāndīpaniṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5163: 02,035.029d@021_0861 lekhyaṃ ca gaṇitaṃ cobhau prāpnutāṃ yadunandanau
GE07mbh_02_u:5166: 02,035.029d@021_0864 tāv ubhau jagmatur vīrau guruṃ sāndīpaniṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5169: 02,035.029d@021_0867 tena tau satkṛtau rājan vicarantāv avantiṣu
GE07mbh_02_u:5172: 02,035.029d@021_0870 dṛṣṭvā kṛtārthau viprendro gurvarthe tāv acodayat
GE07mbh_02_u:5175: 02,035.029d@021_0873 putram ānaya bhadraṃ te bhakṣitaṃ timinā mama
GE07mbh_02_u:5177: 02,035.029d@021_0875 aśakyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kartum anyena kena cit
GE07mbh_02_u:5178: 02,035.029d@021_0876 yaś ca sāndīpaneḥ putraṃ jaghāna bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_02_u:5181: 02,035.029d@021_0879 dīrghakālaṃ gataḥ pretaḥ punar āsīc charīravān
GE07mbh_02_u:5182: 02,035.029d@021_0880 tad aśakyam acintyaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sumahad adbhutam
GE07mbh_02_u:5184: 02,035.029d@021_0882 aiśvaryāṇi ca sarvāṇi gavāśvaṃ ca dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_02_u:5190: 02,035.029d@021_0888 tasya cāpratimo yantā vajrapāṇeḥ priyaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_02_u:5195: 02,035.029d@021_0893 udvijante sma rājānaḥ suparṇād iva pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5205: 02,035.029d@021_0903 abhavad bhojarājasya dvis tāvad dhi mahad balam
GE07mbh_02_u:5210: 02,035.029d@021_0908 sunāmā sarvatas tv enaṃ sa kaṃsaṃ paryapālayat
GE07mbh_02_u:5211: 02,035.029d@021_0909 ya āsan sarvavarṇās tu hayās tasya yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_02_u:5212: 02,035.029d@021_0910 sa gaṇo miśrako nāma ṣaṣṭisāhasra ucyate
GE07mbh_02_u:5220: 02,035.029d@021_0918 ko vā nārāyaṇād ekaḥ kaṃsahantā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_02_u:5221: 02,035.029d@021_0919 eṣa śakrarathe tiṣṭhaṃs tāny anīkāni bhārata
GE07mbh_02_u:5223: 02,035.029d@021_0921 taṃ sabhāsthaṃ sahāmātyaṃ hatvā kaṃsaṃ sahānvayam
GE07mbh_02_u:5225: 02,035.029d@021_0923 yaśodāṃ rohiṇīṃ caiva abhivādya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5233: 02,035.029d@021_0930 pratyapadyata yānāni ratnāni ca bahūni ca
GE07mbh_02_u:5235: 02,035.029d@021_0932 tatra vighnaṃ caranti sma daiteyāḥ saha dānavaiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5237: 02,035.029d@021_0934 sa vighnam akarot tatra narako nāma nairṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5240: 02,035.029d@021_0937 mānuṣāṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca pratīpam akarot tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:5241: 02,035.029d@021_0938 tvaṣṭur duhitaraṃ bhaumaḥ kaśerum agamat tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:5243: 02,035.029d@021_0940 pramathya ca jahāraināṃ hṛtvā ca narako 'bravīt
GE07mbh_02_u:5247: 02,035.029d@021_0943 bibharti ca mahī kṛtsnā sāgareṣu ca yad vasu
GE07mbh_02_u:5251: 02,035.029d@021_0947 sa jahāra tadā bhaumaḥ strīratnāni ca bhārata
GE07mbh_02_u:5252: 02,035.029d@021_0948 gandharvāṇāṃ ca yāḥ kanyā jahāra narako balāt
GE07mbh_02_u:5253: 02,035.029d@021_0949 yāś ca devamanuṣyāṇāṃ sapta cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5258: 02,035.029d@021_0954 tāś ca prāgjyotiṣo rājā murasya daśa cātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5259: 02,035.029d@021_0955 nairṛtāś ca yathā mukhyāḥ pālayanta upāsate
GE07mbh_02_u:5260: 02,035.029d@021_0956 sa eṣa tapasaḥ pāre varadatto mahīsutaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5262: 02,035.029d@021_0958 na cāsuragaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaiḥ karma tat purā
GE07mbh_02_u:5264: 02,035.029d@021_0960 yaṃ mahī suṣuve devī yasya prāgjyotiṣaṃ puram
GE07mbh_02_u:5268: 02,035.029d@021_0964 hayagrīvo nisumbhaś ca ghoraḥ pañcajanas tathā
GE07mbh_02_u:5273: 02,035.029d@021_0969 nivāso dvārakā tāta vidito vaḥ pradhānataḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5274: 02,035.029d@021_0970 atīva hi purī ramyā dvārakā vāsavakṣayāt
GE07mbh_02_u:5275: 02,035.029d@021_0971 ati vai rājate pṛthvyāṃ pratyakṣaṃ te yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_02_u:5281: 02,035.029d@021_0977 divyagandhā vavur vātāḥ kusumānāṃ ca vṛṣṭayaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5284: 02,035.029d@021_0980 madhye tu tejasas tasya pāṇḍaraṃ gajam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5286: 02,035.029d@021_0982 rāmakṛṣṇau ca rājā ca vṛṣṇyandhakagaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_02_u:5289: 02,035.029d@021_0985 sasvaje baladevaṃ ca rājānaṃ ca tam āhukam
GE07mbh_02_u:5290: 02,035.029d@021_0986 uddhavaṃ vasudevaṃ ca vikadruṃ ca mahāmatim
GE07mbh_02_u:5294: 02,035.029d@021_0990 pariṣvajya ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5296: 02,035.029d@021_0992 pragṛhya pūjāṃ tair dattāṃ bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5298: 02,035.029d@021_0994 uvāca paramaprīto jahi bhaumam iti prabho
GE07mbh_02_u:5302: 02,035.029d@021_0997 evam uktvā tu govindo rāmam evābhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_02_u:5303: 02,035.029d@021_0998 pradyumnam aniruddhaṃ ca sāmbaṃ cāpratimaṃ bale
GE07mbh_02_u:5304: 02,035.029d@021_0999 etāṃś coktvā tadā tatra vāsudevo mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5310: 02,035.029d@021_1005 kṣurāntān mauravān pāśān ṣaṭsahasraṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5311: 02,035.029d@021_1006 saṃchidya pāśāñ śastreṇa muraṃ hatvā sahānvayam
GE07mbh_02_u:5313: 02,035.029d@021_1008 yaḥ sahasrasamas tv ekaḥ sarvān devān ayodhayat
GE07mbh_02_u:5319: 02,035.029d@021_1014 tataḥ prāgjyotiṣaṃ nāma dīpyamānam iva śriyā
GE07mbh_02_u:5320: 02,035.029d@021_1015 puram āsādayām āsa tatra yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_02_u:5321: 02,035.029d@021_1016 mahad devāsuraṃ yuddhaṃ yad vṛttaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_02_u:5322: 02,035.029d@021_1017 yuddhaṃ na syāt samaṃ tena lokavismayakārakam
GE07mbh_02_u:5329: 02,035.029d@021_1024 tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ tena bhaumena bhārata
GE07mbh_02_u:5335: 02,035.029d@021_1030 bhūmis tu patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā te vai prādāc ca kuṇḍale
GE07mbh_02_u:5336: 02,035.029d@021_1031 pradāya ca mahābāhum idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_02_u:5337: 02,035.029d@021_1032 sṛṣṭas tvayaiva madhuhaṃs tvayaiva nihataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_02_u:5340: 02,035.029d@021_1034 devānāṃ ca munīnāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_02_u:5345: 02,035.029d@021_1039 naiva manyus tvayā kāryo yat kṛtaṃ mayi bhāmini
GE07mbh_02_u:5346: 02,035.029d@021_1040 matprabhāvāc ca te putro labdhavān gatim uttamām
GE07mbh_02_u:5352: 02,035.029d@021_1045 dadarśa dhanam akṣayyaṃ ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_02_u:5358: 02,035.029d@021_1051 yat tad arthaṃ gṛhe dṛṣṭaṃ narakasya dhanaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_02_u:5359: 02,035.029d@021_1052 na hi rājñaḥ kuberasya tāvad dhanasamucchrayaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5361: 02,035.029d@021_1054 hate bhaume nisumbhe ca vāsavaḥ sagaṇo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_02_u:5367: 02,035.029d@021_1060 te ca viṃśatisāhasrā dvis tāvatyaḥ kareṇavaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5369: 02,035.029d@021_1062 gobhiś cāvikṛtair yānaiḥ kāmaṃ tava janārdana
GE07mbh_02_u:5371: 02,035.029d@021_1064 āvikāni ca sūkṣmāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca
GE07mbh_02_u:5374: 02,035.029d@021_1067 tac ca te prāpayiṣyāmi vṛṣṇyāvāsam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_02_u:5375: 02,035.029d@021_1068 vasu yat triṣu lokeṣu dharmeṇaivārjitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_02_u:5378: 02,035.029d@021_1071 etat tu garuḍe sarvaṃ kṣipram āropya vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5380: 02,035.029d@021_1073 tatra puṇyā vavur vātāḥ prabhāś citrāḥ samujjvalāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5382: 02,035.029d@021_1075 tridaśā ṛṣayaś caiva candrādityau tathā divi
GE07mbh_02_u:5384: 02,035.029d@021_1077 anujñātas tu rāmeṇa vāsavena ca keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5396: 02,035.029d@021_1089 vratasaṃtāpajaḥ śoko nātra kāś cid apīḍayat
GE07mbh_02_u:5397: 02,035.029d@021_1090 arajāṃsi ca vāsāṃsi bibhratyaḥ kauśikāny api
GE07mbh_02_u:5399: 02,035.029d@021_1092 ūcuś cainaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ sarvās tāḥ kamalekṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5402: 02,035.029d@021_1095 so 'suraṃ narakaṃ hatvā nisumbhaṃ muram eva ca
GE07mbh_02_u:5403: 02,035.029d@021_1096 bhaumaṃ ca saparīvāraṃ hayagrīvaṃ ca dānavam
GE07mbh_02_u:5404: 02,035.029d@021_1097 tathā pañcajanaṃ caiva prāpsyate dhanam akṣayam
GE07mbh_02_u:5406: 02,035.029d@021_1099 evam uktvāgamad dhīmān devarṣir nāradas tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:5407: 02,035.029d@021_1100 tvāṃ cintayānāḥ satataṃ tapo ghoram upāsmahe
GE07mbh_02_u:5409: 02,035.029d@021_1102 ity evaṃ hṛdi saṃkalpaṃ kṛtvā puruṣasattama
GE07mbh_02_u:5410: 02,035.029d@021_1103 tapaś carāma satataṃ rakṣyamāṇā hi dānavaiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5411: 02,035.029d@021_1104 gāndharveṇa vivāhena vivāhaṃ kuru naḥ priyam
GE07mbh_02_u:5418: 02,035.029d@021_1111 satyaṃ bata purā vāyur idam asmān ihābravīt
GE07mbh_02_u:5421: 02,035.029d@021_1114 sa bhaumaṃ narakaṃ hatvā bhartā vo bhavitā hi saḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5423: 02,035.029d@021_1116 vacanaṃ darśanād eva satyaṃ bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_02_u:5424: 02,035.029d@021_1117 yat priyaṃ bata paśyāma vaktraṃ candropamaṃ tu te
GE07mbh_02_u:5425: 02,035.029d@021_1118 darśanena kṛtārthāḥ sma vayam adya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5426: 02,035.029d@021_1119 uvāca sa yaduśreṣṭhaḥ sarvās tā jātamanmathāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5427: 02,035.029d@021_1120 yathā brūta viśālākṣyas tat sarvaṃ vo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_02_u:5434: 02,035.029d@021_1127 nyaṅkubhiś ca varāhaiś ca rurubhiś ca niṣevitam
GE07mbh_02_u:5438: 02,035.029d@021_1131 upendraṃ baladevaṃ ca vāsavaṃ ca mahābalam
GE07mbh_02_u:5439: 02,035.029d@021_1132 taṃ ca ratnaugham atulaṃ parvataṃ ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5442: 02,035.029d@021_1135 dikṣu sarvāsu saṃrāvaṃ sa cakre garuḍo vahan
GE07mbh_02_u:5449: 02,035.029d@021_1142 viśveṣāṃ marutāṃ caiva sādhyānāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_02_u:5455: 02,035.029d@021_1148 aditeḥ kuṇḍale divye dadāvātha tadā vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5456: 02,035.029d@021_1149 ratnāni ca parārdhyāṇi rāmeṇa saha keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5457: 02,035.029d@021_1150 pratigṛhya ca tat sarvam aditir vāsavānujam
GE07mbh_02_u:5458: 02,035.029d@021_1151 pūjayām āsa dāśārhaṃ rāmaṃ ca vigatajvarā
GE07mbh_02_u:5460: 02,035.029d@021_1153 satyabhāmāṃ tu saṃgṛhya adityai vai nyavedayat
GE07mbh_02_u:5464: 02,035.029d@021_1156 jarāṃ na yāsyasi śubhe yāvad vai kṛṣṇamānuṣam
GE07mbh_02_u:5467: 02,035.029d@021_1158 vihṛtya satyabhāmā vai saha śacyā sumadhyamā
GE07mbh_02_u:5474: 02,035.029d@021_1164 tāṃ purīṃ dvārakāṃ dṛṣṭvā vibhur nārāyaṇo hariḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5476: 02,035.029d@021_1166 so 'paśyad vṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃś ca ramyān ārāmajān bahūn
GE07mbh_02_u:5498: 02,035.029d@021_1188 bhāti tālavanaṃ caiva puṣpakaṃ puṇḍarīki ca
GE07mbh_02_u:5501: 02,035.029d@021_1191 bhāti caitrarathaṃ caiva nandanaṃ ca mahāvanam
GE07mbh_02_u:5503: 02,035.029d@021_1193 bhāti puṣkariṇī ramyā pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhārata
GE07mbh_02_u:5510: 02,035.029d@021_1200 āyasaiś ca mahācakrair dadarśa dvārakāṃ purīm
GE07mbh_02_u:5517: 02,035.029d@021_1207 vyūhānām antarā mārgāḥ sapta caiva mahāpathāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5518: 02,035.029d@021_1208 tatra sā vihitā sākṣān nagarī viśvakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_02_u:5542: 02,035.029d@021_1232 dadṛśe dvārakātīva meghair dyaur iva saṃvṛtā
GE07mbh_02_u:5545: 02,035.029d@021_1235 tāvad eva ca vistīrṇam aprameyaṃ mahādhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5549: 02,035.029d@021_1239 meror iva gireḥ śṛṅgam ucchritaṃ kāñcanāyutam
GE07mbh_02_u:5550: 02,035.029d@021_1240 rukmiṇyāḥ pravaro vāso vihitaḥ sa mahātmanā
GE07mbh_02_u:5551: 02,035.029d@021_1241 satyabhāmā punar veśma sadā vasati pāṇḍaram
GE07mbh_02_u:5556: 02,035.029d@021_1246 prabhayā bhūṣaṇaiś citrais trailokyam iva bhāsayan
GE07mbh_02_u:5557: 02,035.029d@021_1247 yas tu pāṇḍaravarṇābhas tayor antaram āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5565: 02,035.029d@021_1255 yas tu sūryaprabho nāma prāsādavara ucyate
GE07mbh_02_u:5569: 02,035.029d@021_1259 yaṃ viduḥ sarvabhūtāni harir ity eva bhārata
GE07mbh_02_u:5573: 02,035.029d@021_1263 atīva ramyaḥ so 'py atra prahasann iva tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_02_u:5578: 02,035.029d@021_1268 yas tu prāsādamukhyo 'tra yaṃ tvaṣṭā vyadadhāt svayam
GE07mbh_02_u:5580: 02,035.029d@021_1270 teṣāṃ tu vihitāḥ sarve rukmadaṇḍāḥ patākinaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5588: 02,035.029d@021_1278 ādityapathagaṃ yat tan meroḥ śikharam uttamam
GE07mbh_02_u:5590: 02,035.029d@021_1280 tad apy utpāṭya kṛṣṇena svaṃ niveśanam āhṛtam
GE07mbh_02_u:5600: 02,035.029d@021_1290 bhallātakāḥ kapitthāś ca candravṛkṣāś ca campakāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5602: 02,035.029d@021_1292 ye ca haimavatā vṛkṣā ye ca nandanajās tathā
GE07mbh_02_u:5609: 02,035.029d@021_1299 saptaparṇāḥ kadambāś ca nīpāḥ kuravakās tathā
GE07mbh_02_u:5622: 02,035.029d@021_1312 udumbaraiś ca bilvaiś ca pālāśaiḥ pāribhadrakaiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5626: 02,035.029d@021_1316 vaṃśaiś ca vividhais tatra samantāt pariropitaiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5627: 02,035.029d@021_1317 ye ca nandanajā vṛkṣā ye ca caitrarathe vane
GE07mbh_02_u:5639: 02,035.029d@021_1329 tena te ca mahāśailāḥ saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_02_u:5642: 02,035.029d@021_1331 evam ālokayāṃ cakrur dvārakām ṛṣabhās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5644: 02,035.029d@021_1333 tatas taṃ pāṇḍaraṃ śaurir mūrdhni tiṣṭhan garutmataḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5646: 02,035.029d@021_1335 tasya śaṅkhasya śabdena sāgaraś cukṣubhe bhṛśam
GE07mbh_02_u:5647: 02,035.029d@021_1336 rarāsa ca nabhaḥ sarvaṃ tac citram abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:5652: 02,035.029d@021_1341 tatas tūryapraṇādaś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5654: 02,035.029d@021_1343 tatas te sarvadāśārhāḥ sarve ca kukurāndhakāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5659: 02,035.029d@021_1348 rohiṇī ca yathoddeśam āhukasya ca yā striyaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5661: 02,035.029d@021_1350 evam uktaḥ saha strībhir akṣatair madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:5662: 02,035.029d@021_1351 tataḥ śauriḥ suparṇena svaṃ niveśanam abhyayāt

GE07mbh_02_u:6023: 02,038.010c iti te bhīṣma śṛṇvānāḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6024: 02,038.010d*0368_01 matimanto na śaṃsanti sajjanā dharmiṇaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_02_u:6025: 02,038.011a yasya cānena dharmajña bhuktam annaṃ balīyasaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6026: 02,038.011c sa cānena hataḥ kaṃsa ity etan na mahādbhutam
GE07mbh_02_u:6029: 02,038.012a na te śrutam idaṃ bhīṣma nūnaṃ kathayatāṃ satām
GE07mbh_02_u:6030: 02,038.012c yad vakṣye tvām adharmajña vākyaṃ kurukulādhama
GE07mbh_02_u:6031: 02,038.013a strīṣu goṣu na śastrāṇi pātayed brāhmaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_02_u:6032: 02,038.013c yasya cānnāni bhuñjīta yaś ca syāc charaṇāgataḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6034: 02,038.014c bhīṣma loke hi tat sarvaṃ vitathaṃ tvayi dṛśyate
GE07mbh_02_u:6035: 02,038.015a jñānavṛddhaṃ ca vṛddhaṃ ca bhūyāṃsaṃ keśavaṃ mama
GE07mbh_02_u:6037: 02,038.015e goghnaḥ strīghnaś ca san bhīṣma kathaṃ saṃstavam arhati
GE07mbh_02_u:6040: 02,038.016a asau matimatāṃ śreṣṭho ya eṣa jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6041: 02,038.016c saṃbhāvayati yady evaṃ tvadvākyāc ca janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6042: 02,038.016e evam etat sarvam iti sarvaṃ tad vitathaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_02_u:6043: 02,038.017a na gāthā gāthinaṃ śāsti bahu ced api gāyati
GE07mbh_02_u:6045: 02,038.018a nūnaṃ prakṛtir eṣā te jaghanyā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6046: 02,038.018b*0371_01 nadīsutatvāt te cittaṃ cañcalaṃ na sthiraṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_02_u:6048: 02,038.019a yeṣām arcyatamaḥ kṛṣṇas tvaṃ ca yeṣāṃ pradarśakaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6049: 02,038.019c dharmavāk tvam adharmajñaḥ satāṃ mārgād avaplutaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6050: 02,038.020a ko hi dharmiṇam ātmānaṃ jānañ jñānavatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6051: 02,038.020c kuryād yathā tvayā bhīṣma kṛtaṃ dharmam avekṣatā
GE07mbh_02_u:6052: 02,038.020d*0372_01 cet tvaṃ dharmaṃ vijānāsi yadi prājñā matis tava
GE07mbh_02_u:6055: 02,038.021c ambā nāmeti bhadraṃ te kathaṃ sāpahṛtā tvayā
GE07mbh_02_u:6056: 02,038.022a yāṃ tvayāpahṛtāṃ bhīṣma kanyāṃ naiṣitavān nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6057: 02,038.022c bhrātā vicitravīryas te satāṃ vṛttam anuṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6060: 02,038.024a na hi dharmo 'sti te bhīṣma brahmacaryam idaṃ vṛthā
GE07mbh_02_u:6061: 02,038.024c yad dhārayasi mohād vā klībatvād vā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6062: 02,038.025a na tv ahaṃ tava dharmajña paśyāmy upacayaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_02_u:6063: 02,038.025c na hi te sevitā vṛddhā ya evaṃ dharmam abruvan
GE07mbh_02_u:6064: 02,038.026a iṣṭaṃ dattam adhītaṃ ca yajñāś ca bahudakṣiṇāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6065: 02,038.026c sarvam etad apatyasya kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm
GE07mbh_02_u:6066: 02,038.027a vratopavāsair bahubhiḥ kṛtaṃ bhavati bhīṣma yat
GE07mbh_02_u:6067: 02,038.027c sarvaṃ tad anapatyasya moghaṃ bhavati niścayāt
GE07mbh_02_u:6069: 02,038.028c haṃsavat tvam apīdānīṃ jñātibhyaḥ prāpnuyā vadham
GE07mbh_02_u:6070: 02,038.029a evaṃ hi kathayanty anye narā jñānavidaḥ purā
GE07mbh_02_u:6071: 02,038.029c bhīṣma yat tad ahaṃ samyag vakṣyāmi tava śṛṇvataḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6072: 02,038.030a vṛddhaḥ kila samudrānte kaś cid dhaṃso 'bhavat purā
GE07mbh_02_u:6074: 02,038.031a dharmaṃ carata mādharmam iti tasya vacaḥ kila
GE07mbh_02_u:6075: 02,038.031b*0374_01 ghorāṃ māyāṃ praviṣṭāḥ stha tasmāj jāgrata jāgrata
GE07mbh_02_u:6076: 02,038.031b*0374_02 ahiṃsā paramo dharma iti tasya vacaḥ kila
GE07mbh_02_u:6078: 02,038.031d@022_0001 haṃsasya tad vacaḥ śrutvā muditāḥ sarvapakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6080: 02,038.031d@022_0002 ūcuś cainaṃ khagā haṃsaṃ parivārya ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6081: 02,038.031d@022_0003 kathayasva bhavān dharmaṃ pakṣiṇāṃ tat samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6082: 02,038.031d@022_0004 ko hi nāma dvijaśreṣṭha brūhi no dharmam uttamam
GE07mbh_02_u:6084: 02,038.031d@022_0005 prajāsv ahiṃsā dharmo vai hiṃsādharmaḥ khagavrajāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6088: 02,038.031d@022_0008 ūcuś ca dharmalubdhās te smayamānā ivāṇḍajāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6089: 02,038.031d@022_0009 dharmaṃ yaḥ kurute nityaṃ loke dhīrataro 'ṇḍajaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6091: 02,038.031d@022_0010 sa yatra gacched dharmātmā tan no brūhīha tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6092: 02,038.031d@022_0011 dharmaṃ yaḥ kurute nityaṃ loke sadvṛttim āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6094: 02,038.031d@022_0012 sa gacchet sarvalokān vai tathā vai niyataṃ khagāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6095: 02,038.031d@022_0013 jñātvā hi dharmādharmaṃ ca nityaṃ loke dvijottama
GE07mbh_02_u:6097: 02,038.031d@022_0014 durlabhaṃ svargalokaṃ tu taṃ kasmāt tvaṃ na gacchasi
GE07mbh_02_u:6098: 02,038.031d@022_0015 bālā yūyaṃ na jānīdhvaṃ dharmasūkṣmaṃ vihaṃgamāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6099: 02,038.031d@022_0016 dharmaṃ yaḥ kurute loke satataṃ śubhabuddhinā
GE07mbh_02_u:6100: 02,038.031d@022_0017 sa cāyuṣo 'nte svaṃ dehaṃ tyaktvā svargaṃ tu gacchati
GE07mbh_02_u:6101: 02,038.031d@022_0018 sa cāham api ca tyaktvā kāle deham imaṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6103: 02,038.031d@022_0019 svargalokaṃ gamiṣyāmi iyaṃ dharmasya vai gatiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6104: 02,038.031d@022_0020 evaṃ dharmakathāṃ cakre sa haṃsaḥ pakṣiṇāṃ bhṛśam
GE07mbh_02_u:6105: 02,038.031d@022_0021 pakṣiṇaḥ śuśruvur bhīṣma satataṃ dharmam eva te
GE07mbh_02_u:6107: 02,038.032c aṇḍajā bhīṣma tasyānye dharmārtham iti śuśruma
GE07mbh_02_u:6110: 02,038.034a teṣām aṇḍāni sarveṣāṃ bhakṣayām āsa pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_02_u:6113: 02,038.035c aśaṅkata mahāprājñas taṃ kadā cid dadarśa ha
GE07mbh_02_u:6115: 02,038.035c*0375_02 tato gateṣu haṃseṣu sarveṣu carituṃ tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:6117: 02,038.035d*0376_01 tato gateṣu haṃseṣu sarveṣu caritaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:6118: 02,038.035d*0376_02 sthita ātmānam āvṛtya taṃ kadā cid dadarśa ha
GE07mbh_02_u:6119: 02,038.036a tataḥ sa kathayām āsa dṛṣṭvā haṃsasya kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_02_u:6121: 02,038.037a tataḥ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭvā pakṣiṇas te samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6122: 02,038.037c nijaghnus taṃ tadā haṃsaṃ mithyāvṛttaṃ kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_02_u:6123: 02,038.037d*0377_01 haṃsavat tvam apīdānīṃ jñātibhyo vadham āpnuyāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6126: 02,038.038c nihanyur bhīṣma saṃkruddhāḥ pakṣiṇas tam ivāṇḍajam
GE07mbh_02_u:6127: 02,038.039a gāthām apy atra gāyanti ye purāṇavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6128: 02,038.039c bhīṣma yāṃ tāṃ ca te samyak kathayiṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_02_u:6134: 02,039.001a sa me bahumato rājā jarāsaṃdho mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6135: 02,039.001c yo 'nena yuddhaṃ neyeṣa dāso 'yam iti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_02_u:6136: 02,039.002a keśavena kṛtaṃ yat tu jarāsaṃdhavadhe tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:6137: 02,039.002c bhīmasenārjunābhyāṃ ca kas tat sādhv iti manyate
GE07mbh_02_u:6141: 02,039.004c naiṣitaṃ pādyam asmai tad dātum agre durātmane
GE07mbh_02_u:6144: 02,039.006a yady ayaṃ jagataḥ kartā yathainaṃ mūrkha manyase
GE07mbh_02_u:6145: 02,039.006c kasmān na brāhmaṇaṃ samyag ātmānam avagacchati
GE07mbh_02_u:6146: 02,039.007a idaṃ tv āścaryabhūtaṃ me yad ime pāṇḍavās tvayā
GE07mbh_02_u:6147: 02,039.007c apakṛṣṭāḥ satāṃ mārgān manyante tac ca sādhv iti
GE07mbh_02_u:6148: 02,039.008a atha vā naitad āścaryaṃ yeṣāṃ tvam asi bhārata
GE07mbh_02_u:6149: 02,039.008c strīsadharmā ca vṛddhaś ca sarvārthānāṃ pradarśakaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6151: 02,039.009a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rūkṣaṃ rūkṣākṣaraṃ bahu
GE07mbh_02_u:6157: 02,039.012a dantān saṃdaśatas tasya kopād dadṛśur ānanam
GE07mbh_02_u:6162: 02,039.014c guruṇā vividhair vākyaiḥ krodhaḥ praśamam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6163: 02,039.015a nāticakrāma bhīṣmasya sa hi vākyam ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6166: 02,039.016c nākampata tadā vīraḥ pauruṣe sve vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6167: 02,039.017a utpatantaṃ tu vegena punaḥ punar ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6168: 02,039.017c na sa taṃ cintayām āsa siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_02_u:6171: 02,039.019a muñcainaṃ bhīṣma paśyantu yāvad enaṃ narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6173: 02,039.020a tataś cedipater vākyaṃ tac chrutvā kurusattamaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6175: 02,039.020d*0379_01 naiṣā cedipater buddhir yayā tv āhvayate 'cyutam
GE07mbh_02_u:6181: 02,040.002c vaikṛtaṃ tac ca tau dṛṣṭvā tyāgāya kurutāṃ matim
GE07mbh_02_u:6184: 02,040.004a eṣa te nṛpate putraḥ śrīmāñ jāto mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6185: 02,040.004c tasmād asmān na bhetavyam avyagraḥ pāhi vai śiśum
GE07mbh_02_u:6186: 02,040.005a na caivaitasya mṛtyus tvaṃ na kālaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6187: 02,040.005c mṛtyur hantāsya śastreṇa sa cotpanno narādhipa
GE07mbh_02_u:6190: 02,040.007a yenedam īritaṃ vākyaṃ mamaiva tanayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_02_u:6191: 02,040.007c prāñjalis taṃ namasyāmi bravītu sa punar vacaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6192: 02,040.007d*0380_01 yāthātathyena bhagavān devo vā yadi vetaraḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6193: 02,040.007d*0381_01 mahad balaṃ mahad bhūtam ity uktvā punar uttaram
GE07mbh_02_u:6194: 02,040.008a śrotum icchāmi putrasya ko 'sya mṛtyur bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_02_u:6195: 02,040.008c antarhitaṃ tato bhūtam uvācedaṃ punar vacaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6198: 02,040.010a tṛtīyam etad bālasya lalāṭasthaṃ ca locanam
GE07mbh_02_u:6199: 02,040.010c nimajjiṣyati yaṃ dṛṣṭvā so 'sya mṛtyur bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_02_u:6200: 02,040.011a tryakṣaṃ caturbhujaṃ śrutvā tathā ca samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_02_u:6202: 02,040.012a tān pūjayitvā saṃprāptān yathārhaṃ sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6205: 02,040.013c śiśur aṅke samārūḍho na tat prāpa nidarśanam
GE07mbh_02_u:6206: 02,040.013d*0382_01 etad eva tu saṃśrutya dvāravatyāṃ mahābalau
GE07mbh_02_u:6208: 02,040.014c yādavau yādavīṃ draṣṭuṃ svasāraṃ tāṃ pitus tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:6211: 02,040.015a abhivādya yathānyāyaṃ yathājyeṣṭhaṃ nṛpāṃś ca tān
GE07mbh_02_u:6213: 02,040.016a abhyarcitau tadā vīrau prītyā cābhyadhikaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6216: 02,040.017c petatus tac ca nayanaṃ nimamajja lalāṭajam
GE07mbh_02_u:6217: 02,040.018a tad dṛṣṭvā vyathitā trastā varaṃ kṛṣṇam ayācata
GE07mbh_02_u:6218: 02,040.018c dadasva me varaṃ kṛṣṇa bhayārtāyā mahābhuja
GE07mbh_02_u:6219: 02,040.019a tvaṃ hy ārtānāṃ samāśvāso bhītānām abhayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6220: 02,040.019b*0385_01 evam uktas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ provāca yadunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6221: 02,040.019b*0386_01 sa taṃ dvyakṣaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā samāśvāsya mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6223: 02,040.019c pitṛṣvasāraṃ mā bhaiṣīr ity uvāca janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6224: 02,040.020a dadāni kaṃ varaṃ kiṃ vā karavāṇi pitṛṣvasaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6225: 02,040.020c śakyaṃ vā yadi vāśakyaṃ kariṣyāmi vacas tava
GE07mbh_02_u:6226: 02,040.021a evam uktā tataḥ kṛṣṇam abravīd yadunandanam
GE07mbh_02_u:6228: 02,040.021d*0388_01 matkṛte yaduśārdūla viddhy enaṃ me varaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_02_u:6231: 02,040.022a aparādhaśataṃ kṣāmyaṃ mayā hy asya pitṛṣvasaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6232: 02,040.022c putrasya te vadhārhāṇāṃ mā tvaṃ śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6233: 02,040.022d*0390_01 evam etat purāvṛttaṃ śiśāv asmin vṛkodara
GE07mbh_02_u:6234: 02,040.022d*0391_01 sa jānann ātmano mṛtyuṃ kṛṣṇaṃ yadusukhāvaham
GE07mbh_02_u:6236: 02,040.023a evam eṣa nṛpaḥ pāpaḥ śiśupālaḥ sumandadhīḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6241: 02,041.002a ko hi māṃ bhīmasenādya kṣitāv arhati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6243: 02,041.003a eṣa hy asya mahābāho tejoṃśaś ca harer dhruvam
GE07mbh_02_u:6244: 02,041.003c tam eva punar ādātum icchat pṛthuyaśā hariḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6246: 02,041.004c garjaty atīva durbuddhiḥ sarvān asmān acintayan
GE07mbh_02_u:6248: 02,041.005a tato na mamṛṣe caidyas tad bhīṣmavacanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_02_u:6249: 02,041.005c uvāca cainaṃ saṃkruddhaḥ punar bhīṣmam athottaram
GE07mbh_02_u:6251: 02,041.006a dviṣatāṃ no 'stu bhīṣmaiṣa prabhāvaḥ keśavasya yaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6253: 02,041.007a saṃstavāya mano bhīṣma pareṣāṃ ramate sadā
GE07mbh_02_u:6254: 02,041.007c yadi saṃstauṣi rājñas tvam imaṃ hitvā janārdanam
GE07mbh_02_u:6264: 02,041.010a droṇaṃ drauṇiṃ ca sādhu tvaṃ pitāputrau mahārathau
GE07mbh_02_u:6265: 02,041.010c stuhi stutyāv imau bhīṣma satataṃ dvijasattamau
GE07mbh_02_u:6267: 02,041.011c imāṃ vasumatīṃ kuryād aśeṣām iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6268: 02,041.012a droṇasya hi samaṃ yuddhe na paśyāmi narādhipam
GE07mbh_02_u:6269: 02,041.012c aśvatthāmnas tathā bhīṣma na caitau stotum icchasi
GE07mbh_02_u:6270: 02,041.013a śalyādīn api kasmāt tvaṃ na stauṣi vasudhādhipān
GE07mbh_02_u:6271: 02,041.013c stavāya yadi te buddhir vartate bhīṣma sarvadā
GE07mbh_02_u:6272: 02,041.014a kiṃ hi śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ yad vṛddhānāṃ tvayā nṛpa
GE07mbh_02_u:6273: 02,041.014c purā kathayatāṃ nūnaṃ na śrutaṃ dharmavādinām
GE07mbh_02_u:6276: 02,041.016a yad astavyam imaṃ śaśvan mohāt saṃstauṣi bhaktitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6277: 02,041.016c keśavaṃ tac ca te bhīṣma na kaś cid anumanyate
GE07mbh_02_u:6280: 02,041.018a atha vaiṣā na te bhaktiḥ pakṛtiṃ yāti bhārata
GE07mbh_02_u:6284: 02,041.020a mā sāhasam itīdaṃ sā satataṃ vāśate kila

GE07mbh_02_u:6288: 02,041.022a icchataḥ sā hi siṃhasya bhīṣma jīvaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_02_u:6289: 02,041.022c tadvat tvam apy adharmajña sadā vācaḥ prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_02_u:6293: 02,041.024a tataś cedipateḥ śrutvā bhīṣmaḥ sa kaṭukaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6295: 02,041.025a icchatāṃ kila nāmāhaṃ jīvāmy eṣāṃ mahīkṣitām
GE07mbh_02_u:6296: 02,041.025c yo 'haṃ na gaṇayāmy etāṃs tṛṇānīva narādhipān
GE07mbh_02_u:6297: 02,041.026a evam ukte tu bhīṣmeṇa tataḥ saṃcukrudhur nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6298: 02,041.026c ke cij jahṛṣire tatra ke cid bhīṣmaṃ jagarhire
GE07mbh_02_u:6299: 02,041.027a ke cid ūcur maheṣvāsāḥ śrutvā bhīṣmasya tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:6300: 02,041.027c pāpo 'valipto vṛddhaś ca nāyaṃ bhīṣmo 'rhati kṣamām
GE07mbh_02_u:6301: 02,041.028a hanyatāṃ durmatir bhīṣmaḥ paśuvat sādhv ayaṃ nṛpaiḥ

GE07mbh_02_u:9076: 02,061.062a sa vai vivadanād bhītaḥ sudhanvānaṃ vyalokayat

GE07mbh_02_u:9088: 02,061.067a jānan na vibruvan praśnaṃ kāmāt krodhāt tathā bhayāt

GE07mbh_02_u:9094: 02,061.069a viddho dharmo hy adharmeṇa sabhāṃ yatra prapadyate
GE07mbh_02_u:9095: 02,061.069c na cāsya śalyaṃ kṛntanti viddhās tatra sabhāsadaḥ

GE07mbh_02_u:9098: 02,061.070a ardhaṃ harati vai śreṣṭhaḥ pādo bhavati kartṛṣu

GE07mbh_02_u:9100: 02,061.071a anenā bhavati śreṣṭho mucyante ca sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9101: 02,061.071c eno gacchati kartāraṃ nindārho yatra nindyate
GE07mbh_02_u:9102: 02,061.072a vitathaṃ tu vadeyur ye dharmaṃ prahlāda pṛcchate
GE07mbh_02_u:9103: 02,061.072c iṣṭāpūrtaṃ ca te ghnanti sapta caiva parāvarān
GE07mbh_02_u:9104: 02,061.073a hṛtasvasya hi yad duḥkhaṃ hataputrasya cāpi yat
GE07mbh_02_u:9105: 02,061.073c ṛṇinaṃ prati yac caiva rājñā grastasya cāpi yat
GE07mbh_02_u:9106: 02,061.074a striyāḥ patyā vihīnāyāḥ sārthād bhraṣṭasya caiva yat
GE07mbh_02_u:9107: 02,061.074b*0559_01 aputrāyāś ca yad duḥkhaṃ vyāghrāghrātasya caiva yat
GE07mbh_02_u:9108: 02,061.074c adhyūḍhāyāś ca yad duḥkhaṃ sākṣibhir vihatasya ca
GE07mbh_02_u:9109: 02,061.075a etāni vai samāny āhur duḥkhāni tridaśeśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9110: 02,061.075c tāni sarvāṇi duḥkhāni prāpnoti vitathaṃ bruvan

GE07mbh_02_u:9114: 02,061.077a kaśyapasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahlādaḥ putram abravīt
GE07mbh_02_u:9115: 02,061.077c śreyān sudhanvā tvatto vai mattaḥ śreyāṃs tathāṅgirāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9116: 02,061.078a mātā sudhanvanaś cāpi śreyasī mātṛtas tava
GE07mbh_02_u:9119: 02,061.079a putrasnehaṃ parityajya yas tvaṃ dharme pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9120: 02,061.079c anujānāmi te putraṃ jīvatv eṣa śataṃ samāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9122: 02,061.080a evaṃ vai paramaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā sarve sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9123: 02,061.080c yathāpraśnaṃ tu kṛṣṇāyā manyadhvaṃ tatra kiṃ param
GE07mbh_02_u:9125: 02,061.081a vidurasya vacaḥ śrutvā nocuḥ kiṃ cana pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9126: 02,061.081c karṇo duḥśāsanaṃ tv āha kṛṣṇāṃ dāsīṃ gṛhān naya
GE07mbh_02_u:9127: 02,061.082a tāṃ vepamānāṃ savrīḍāṃ pralapantīṃ sma pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_02_u:9130: 02,062.001a purastāt karaṇīyaṃ me na kṛtaṃ kāryam uttaram
GE07mbh_02_u:9134: 02,062.002c na me syād aparādho 'yaṃ yad idaṃ na kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_02_u:9136: 02,062.003a sā tena ca samuddhūtā duḥkhena ca tapasvinī
GE07mbh_02_u:9139: 02,062.004a svayaṃvare yāsmi nṛpair dṛṣṭā raṅge samāgataiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9140: 02,062.004c na dṛṣṭapūrvā cānyatra sāham adya sabhāṃ gatā
GE07mbh_02_u:9141: 02,062.005a yāṃ na vāyur na cādityo dṛṣṭavantau purā gṛhe
GE07mbh_02_u:9143: 02,062.006a yāṃ na mṛṣyanti vātena spṛśyamānāṃ purā gṛhe
GE07mbh_02_u:9145: 02,062.007a mṛṣyante kuravaś ceme manye kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_02_u:9147: 02,062.008a kiṃ tv ataḥ kṛpaṇaṃ bhūyo yad ahaṃ strī satī śubhā
GE07mbh_02_u:9148: 02,062.008c sabhāmadhyaṃ vigāhe 'dya kva nu dharmo mahīkṣitām
GE07mbh_02_u:9149: 02,062.009a dharmyāḥ striyaḥ sabhāṃ pūrvaṃ na nayantīti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_02_u:9150: 02,062.009c sa naṣṭaḥ kauraveyeṣu pūrvo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9151: 02,062.010a kathaṃ hi bhāryā pāṇḍūnāṃ pārṣatasya svasā satī
GE07mbh_02_u:9152: 02,062.010c vāsudevasya ca sakhī pārthivānāṃ sabhām iyām
GE07mbh_02_u:9154: 02,062.011c brūta dāsīm adāsīṃ vā tat kariṣyāmi kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9155: 02,062.012a ayaṃ hi māṃ dṛḍhaṃ kṣudraḥ kauravāṇāṃ yaśoharaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9160: 02,062.012c kliśnāti nāhaṃ tat soḍhuṃ ciraṃ śakṣyāmi kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9161: 02,062.013a jitāṃ vāpy ajitāṃ vāpi manyadhvaṃ vā yathā nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9162: 02,062.013c tathā pratyuktam icchāmi tat kariṣyāmi kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9164: 02,062.014a uktavān asmi kalyāṇi dharmasya tu parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_02_u:9165: 02,062.014c loke na śakyate gantum api viprair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9166: 02,062.015a balavāṃs tu yathā dharmaṃ loke paśyati pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9167: 02,062.015c sa dharmo dharmavelāyāṃ bhavaty abhihitaḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9168: 02,062.016a na vivektuṃ ca te praśnam etaṃ śaknomi niścayāt
GE07mbh_02_u:9170: 02,062.016c sūkṣmatvād gahanatvāc ca kāryasyāsya ca gauravāt
GE07mbh_02_u:9171: 02,062.017a nūnam antaḥ kulasyāsya bhavitā nacirād iva
GE07mbh_02_u:9174: 02,062.018c dharmyān mārgān na cyavante yathā nas tvaṃ vadhūḥ sthitā
GE07mbh_02_u:9175: 02,062.019a upapannaṃ ca pāñcāli tavedaṃ vṛttam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_02_u:9176: 02,062.019c yat kṛcchram api saṃprāptā dharmam evānvavekṣase
GE07mbh_02_u:9177: 02,062.020a ete droṇādayaś caiva vṛddhā dharmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9179: 02,062.021a yudhiṣṭhiras tu praśne 'smin pramāṇam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9180: 02,062.021c ajitāṃ vā jitāṃ vāpi svayaṃ vyāhartum arhati
GE07mbh_02_u:9182: 02,062.022a tathā tu dṛṣṭvā bahu tat tad evaṃ;
GE07mbh_02_u:9184: 02,062.022c nocur vacaḥ sādhv atha vāpy asādhu;
GE07mbh_02_u:9200: 02,062.026c īśo vā te yady anīśo 'tha vaiṣa;
GE07mbh_02_u:9209: hā hety āsīd api caivātra nādaḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9216: 02,062.029a yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca te sarve samudaikṣanta pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9217: 02,062.029c kiṃ nu vakṣyati dharmajña iti sācīkṛtānanāḥ

GE07mbh_02_u:9224: 02,062.033a īśo naḥ puṇyatapasāṃ prāṇānām api ceśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_02_u:9225: 02,062.033c manyate jitam ātmānaṃ yady eṣa vijitā vayam
GE07mbh_02_u:9226: 02,062.034a na hi mucyeta jīvan me padā bhūmim upaspṛśan
GE07mbh_02_u:9228: 02,062.035a paśyadhvam āyatau vṛttau bhujau me parighāv iva
GE07mbh_02_u:9231: 02,062.036c gauraveṇa niruddhaś ca nigrahād arjunasya ca

GE07mbh_02_u:9235: 02,062.038a tam uvāca tadā bhīṣmo droṇo vidura eva ca
GE07mbh_02_u:9236: 02,062.038c kṣamyatām evam ity evaṃ sarvaṃ saṃbhavati tvayi
GE07mbh_02_u:9240: 02,063.001c dāsasya patnī tvaṃ dhanam asya bhadre;

GE07mbh_02_u:9275: 02,063.009a bhīmārjunau yamau caiva sthitau te nṛpa śāsane
GE07mbh_02_u:9276: 02,063.009c praśnaṃ prabrūhi kṛṣṇāṃ tvam ajitāṃ yadi manyase
GE07mbh_02_u:9277: 02,063.010a evam uktvā sa kaunteyam apohya vasanaṃ svakam
GE07mbh_02_u:9283: 02,063.013a vṛkodaras tad ālokya netre utphālya lohite
GE07mbh_02_u:9284: 02,063.013c provāca rājamadhye taṃ sabhāṃ viśrāvayann iva
